evidence.text: On July 7, 2025, this court denied Plaintiffs’ motion for preliminary injunctive relief and dismissed the case for lack of jurisdiction and failure to state a claim.

extracted.value: 2025-07-07: Order entered (denied motion for preliminary injunctive relief and dismissed case).
